entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vaudreuil-Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Anne-de-Bellevue 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: W 19 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
